name: Thermic Spirit
description:
Description

"Thermic Spirit" is a puzzle-solving, action-adventure game in which players assume the character of a spirit who was killed while keeping watch over a castle at night. In order to learn the truth about how they died, the ghost must move across the castle, solving puzzles and overcoming challenges. The spirit will run into adversaries along the route that can either be defeated or scared away based on the player's actions. Finding the truth and a means of finding serenity are the ultimate goals. Because of the game's branching narrative, the player's decisions will have an impact on how the game plays out.

Controls  Use "WASD" to move  Use "Q" to freeze items  Use "E" to ignite objects Hints
  • Many items can be frozen and set on fire
  • There are several endings here
  • Some items, such as chains, can be frozen first and then set on fire to achieve the desired effect
  • VFX is present only in the Windows version
  • To go to the next level, go to the door and press "E"
